testcase.name: check the service POST method
testcase.system-out: * url url ................................................................. passed * def requestBody = read('karate/Article/Create/BodyRequest.json') ........ passed * def responseCrete = read('karate/Article/Create/CreateResponse.json') ... passed * print token ............................................................. passed Given header Authorization = 'Bearer '+ token ............................. passed Given path 'articles' ..................................................... passed And request requestBody ................................................... passed When method POST .......................................................... passed Then status 200 ........................................................... passed And match response == responseCrete ....................................... passed
